item.title: Psychedelic Ayahuasca Moves into the Mainstream
item.description:
Psychedelic Ayahuasca Moves into the Mainstream

I grew up with Matt. We went to grade school and high school together - we've been friends for some 27 years. He was always ahead of the curve on drugs. When we were in seventh grade we went to the Eagles' Hell Freezes Over tour: Matt was happily hitting up people our parents' age for tokes as I innocently buried my nose beneath my sweatshirt.

item.title: Alex Grey: Primary difference between DMT and ayahuasca
item.description:
Alex Grey: Primary difference between DMT and ayahuasca

VOD release of DMT: The Spirit Molecule in Oct 2011. Visit the official website for more updates: http://www.thespiritmolecule.com

item.title: Graham Hancock: Elves, Aliens, Angels and Ayahuasca
item.description:
Graham Hancock: Elves, Aliens, Angels and Ayahuasca

Graham Hancock's first stop on his 2010 North American book tour (for his novel "Entangled" http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ASIN/1934708569/disinformation) was Dragon*Con Atlanta. On opening night he presented his lecture "Elves, Aliens, Angels and Ayahuasca" at Eyedrum. The Disinformation Company videotaped the lecture and is pleased to present it in full for those of Graham's readers not close to tour stops or who were otherwise unable to attend.

item.title: AYAHUASCA - ICAROS for Ceremony (1 hora 40)
item.description:
AYAHUASCA - ICAROS for Ceremony (1 hora 40)

Shamanic songs, performed by the healer Dona Cotrina in the Peruvian jungle of Iquitos. Cantos chamanicos, ejecutados por la curandera Dona Cotrina en la selva peruana de Iquitos. item.title: How to Capsule Ayahuasca, its LEGAL and EASY!
item.description:
How to Capsule Ayahuasca, its LEGAL and EASY!

(See updated video) I love the capsuled ayahuasca experience because its gentle, very clear and the communication with the DMT beings is really easy, and amazing. Expect some big things to happen after the experience, with synchronicity that may blow your mind. I provide tips on obtaining both types of bark and what they look like.

item.title: ICEERS - International Center for Ethnobotanical Education, Research & Services
item.description:
ICEERS - International Center for Ethnobotanical Education, Research & Services

IICEERS Support Service Information & Psychological Help Information about Iboga & ayahuasca Scientific Information & Research Legal Information & Defense We are building a crowd-funded legal defence fund together with the worldwide ayahuasca community, to assure proper legal support for those in need.

item.title: Hallucinogen persisting perception disorder
item.description:
Hallucinogen persisting perception disorder

Hallucinogen persisting perception disorder ( HPPD) is a disorder characterized by a continual presence of sensory disturbances, most commonly visual, that are reminiscent of those generated by the use of hallucinogenic substances. Previous use of hallucinogens by the person is necessary, but not sufficient, for diagnosis of HPPD.

item.title: Flashback (psychology)
item.description:
Flashback (psychology)

A flashback, or involuntary recurrent memory, is a psychological phenomenon in which an individual has a sudden, usually powerful, re-experiencing of a past experience or elements of a past experience. These experiences can be happy, sad, exciting, or any other emotion one can consider.
